flawed_nl_solution:
If Anika is 30 now, in 15 years, she'll be 30+15=<<30+15=46>>46 years old.
At 30, Anika is 4/3 the age of Maddie, meaning Maddie is 4/3*30=<<4/3*30=40>>40 years.
In 15 years, Maddie will be 40+15=<<40+15=55>>55 years old.
Their total age in 15 years will be 55+46=<<55+46=101>>101
Their average age in 15 years will be 101/2=<<101/2=101/2>>101/2
#### 101/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 46. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
